MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Dumbiedykes Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.38am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  a suspected underground cable fault and our team are on site investigating the fault to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.55am on Tuesday 17th November 2020.
